title: switch
content:
# switch

2021-05-09 18:43

Switch.

Scan QR code to try:

![switch](https://marmot-local-dev.oss-ap-southeast-1.aliyuncs.com/storage/2020/1/10/4a4e238c-d0a6-4647-9553-be8ecf4e79e8.png#align=left&display=inline&height=196&margin=%5Bobject%20Object%5D&originHeight=196&originWidth=196&status=done&style=none&width=196)

|     |     |     |
| --- | --- | --- |
| **Property** | **Type** | **Description** |
| name | String | Component name, used for form submission to get data. |
| checked | Boolean | Checked or not. |
| disabled | Boolean | Disable or not. |
| color | String | Component color. |
| onChange | EventHandle | Trigger on checked change, event.detail={ value:checked}. |
| color | Color | Switch color. |

### Screenshot

![switch](https://marmot-local-dev.oss-ap-southeast-1.aliyuncs.com/storage/2020/1/14/fd0e8199-af02-4390-9cdb-d39d2c275124.png#align=left&display=inline&height=436&margin=%5Bobject%20Object%5D&originHeight=436&originWidth=750&status=done&style=stroke&width=750)

### Sample Code

copy

```html
<view class="page">
  <view class="switch-list">
    <view class="switch-item">
      <switch checked onChange="switchChange"/>
    </view>
  </view>
</view>
```

copy

```javascript
Page({
  switchChange (e){
    console.log('switchChange event, value:', e.detail.value)
  },
})
```
